SELECT count(orders.order_id) count, ifnull(SUM(order_price),0) amount , rt.tm FROM ( select DATE_FORMAT(rt.recording_time_id, '%Y年%m月%d日') AS tm DATE_FORMAT(rt.recording_time_id, '%Y年%m月%u周') AS tm DATE_FORMAT(rt.recording_time_id, '%Y年%m月') AS tm
CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(rt.recording_time_id, '%Y年'),CONCAT(quarter( rt.recording_time_id),'季度')) as tm
from recording_time rt
where rt.recording_time_id>=str_to_date(#{stm},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') and rt.recording_time_id<=str_to_date(#{etm},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') GROUP BY tm )rt left join (select * from orders where orders.order_state_id=100004
and orders.order_customer_id=#{customerId}
and orders.order_restaurant_id=#{restaurantId} ) orders on tm=
DATE_FORMAT(orders.order_creat_time, "%Y年%m月%d日")
DATE_FORMAT(orders.order_creat_time, "%Y年%m月%u周")
DATE_FORMAT(orders.order_creat_time, "%Y年%m月")
=CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(orders.order_creat_time, '%Y年'),CONCAT(quarter(orders.order_creat_time),'季度'))
GROUP BY tm order by tm

SELECT count(dispatching.dispatching_id) count, rt.tm FROM ( select DATE_FORMAT(rt.recording_time_id, '%Y年%m月%d日') AS tm DATE_FORMAT(rt.recording_time_id, '%Y年%m月%u周') AS tm DATE_FORMAT(rt.recording_time_id, '%Y年%m月') AS tm
CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(rt.recording_time_id, '%Y年'),CONCAT(quarter( rt.recording_time_id),'季度')) as tm
from recording_time rt
where rt.recording_time_id>=str_to_date(#{stm},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') and rt.recording_time_id<=str_to_date(#{etm},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') GROUP BY tm ) rt left join (select * from dispatching where dispatching.dispatching_state_id=110004
and dispatching.dispatching_rider_id=#{riderId} ) dispatching on tm=
DATE_FORMAT(dispatching.dispatching_update_time, "%Y年%m月%d日")
DATE_FORMAT(dispatching.dispatching_update_time, "%Y年%m月%u周")
DATE_FORMAT(dispatching.dispatching_update_time, "%Y年%m月")
CONCAT(DATE_FORMAT(dispatching.dispatching_update_time, '%Y年'),CONCAT(quarter(dispatching.dispatching_update_time),'季度'))
GROUP BY tm order by tm

SELECT count(dispatching.dispatching_id) count, dispatching.dispatching_state_id type FROM dispatching where 1=1
and dispatching.dispatching_update_time>=str_to_date(#{stm},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
and dispatching.dispatching_update_time<=str_to_date(#{etm},'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s')
and dispatching.dispatching_rider_id=#{riderId}
group by dispatching.dispatching_state_id
